element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm applies a member function to the values in a raster layer and prepares it for fuzzy logic analysis. A member function is defined by a function type and four control points, as shown in the next figure.

element.name: FUNCTIONTYPE
element.text: The type of function defines the transitions between the values 0 and 1 on both sides of the graph. That is, between A and B, and between C and D * Linear: linear formulation (the one shown in the above graph) * Sigmoidal. Sigmoidal formulation for the transitions. * J- shaped.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: Raster layer with values between 0 and 1 obtained from applying the defined member function.
